official_title: To designate the United States Courthouse to be constructed in Jackson, Mississippi, as the "R. Jess Brown United States Courthouse".
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Designates a certain U.S. courthouse to be built in Jackson, Mississippi, as the "R. Jess Brown United States Courthouse."
